\section*{\begin{picture}(20,0) \put(-5,-10){\includegraphics*[width=1cm]{/www/erowid.org/experiences/images/erologo_1cm_600dpi_greyscale}} \end{picture} Erowid Experience Vaults Report Id: 68295}

\subsection*{Colombian Penicillin}
\vspace{-0.2cm}
by \emph{Oggy}
\vspace{0.5cm}
\thispagestyle{plain}

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|c|c|c|}
\hline
Dose:  T+ 0:00 & 600 mg & oral & Pharms - Pregabalin & pill / tablet\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{1mm}

\begin{tabular}[h]{|c|c|}
\hline
Body weight: & 70.00 kg\\
\hline
\end{tabular}

\vspace{2mm}
I asked my doctor for some Lyrica (pregabalin), to fight my general anxiety. I'm right now under the influence, and it's strange, world is kind of buzzing around me. I have bursts of euphoria every 10 minutes or so. I don't want to sleep, because the feeling is unique, I want to experience it in its fullness. 



I would advise this drug. It makes me mellow and happy and sociable. Ask your GP! Dreamy days are about to begin, it's my first day under the influence. Cheers!

\end{document}
